message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I think this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, I believe there might be room for negotiation. Would you consider selling the product for $1200000?

Hello Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $1200000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though! I can offer it to you for $1350000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1275000. This is my best offer at this time.

Hello Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not quite ready to accept. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $1300000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hello Alice, thank you for your final offer. I understand your position and respect your decision. I am willing to pay $1287500 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Hello Bob, I appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make one more adjustment, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I can offer it to you for $1295000. This is my absolute final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
